    <img src="https://github.com/rose-pine/rose-pine-theme/raw/main/assets/icon.png" width="80" />
    <h2 align="center">Rosé Pine for Linear</h2>
</p>

<p align="center">All natural pine, faux fur and a bit of soho vibes for the classy minimalist</p>

<p align="center">
    <a href="https://github.com/rose-pine/rose-pine-theme">
        <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/community-rosé%20pine-26233a?labelColor=191724&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge" />
    </a>
</p>

## Usage

To add a Rosé Pine theme to the Linear app, follow this process:

1. Visit [linear style](https://linear.style/) and click on the respective Rosé Pine theme card; the color strings will automatically be copied to your clipboard.

![Copied Theme String](https://github.com/LopeAriyo/linear/assets/54779085/fba6533f-bca0-40a1-af7f-75f0bcfa545d)


2. Insert in Linear

On Linear, go to Settings -> Preferences -> Theme and select *Custom* from the interface options swatch.

Then, paste the copied theme into the custom text box input.
